text: Jessica Simpson had a ` ` very exciting'' announcement to make on The Ellen DeGeneres Show Monday, and it wasn't something anyone expected. ` ` I'm not pregnant on your show!'' she said. ` ` Are you sure that you're not pregnant?'' host Ellen DeGeneres asked. ` ` I heard that you were.'' ` ` Oh, gosh!'' the fashion mogul replied. ` ` We had an IUD. Nothing's gon na get in that uterus!'' Resisting the obvious joke, DeGeneres smiled and said, ` ` I'm not touching that.''
